programme.title: Villarreal vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 17 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Sociedad have lost two of their last three LaLiga matches against Sevilla, after having not lost any of their previous five against the Sevillians in the competition. Sevilla have lost two of their last three visits to Real Sociedad in LaLiga, although their last away league win against them came in March 2025. They have not won two consecutive away LaLiga matches against Real Sociedad since 2011.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Brighton & Hove Albion - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have won just three of their eight Premier League home games against Brighton, only having a lower win rate against Wimbledon and Liverpool among sides they’ve faced 5+ times. Brighton are winless in their last four Premier League games against Arsenal, though they did come from behind to draw 1-1 in both meetings last season.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Brighton & Hove Albion - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have won just three of their eight Premier League home games against Brighton, only having a lower win rate against Wimbledon and Liverpool among sides they’ve faced 5+ times. Brighton are winless in their last four Premier League games against Arsenal, though they did come from behind to draw 1-1 in both meetings last season.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool have won 16 of their last 17 Premier League games against Wolves, with the exception being a 3-0 loss at Molineux in February 2023. Wolves have lost their last eight Premier League away games against Liverpool, since a 1-0 win in December 2010. In their top-flight history, only at Man City and the Reds themselves have they had longer losing runs on the road.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 18 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool have won 16 of their last 17 Premier League games against Wolves, with the exception being a 3-0 loss at Molineux in February 2023. Wolves have lost their last eight Premier League away games against Liverpool, since a 1-0 win in December 2010. In their top-flight history, only at Man City and the Reds themselves have they had longer losing runs on the road.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Sevilla - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 17 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Espanyol have only won one of their last six LaLiga games against Elche, the last of which was a 1-0 win in February 2023, and have not won two consecutive games against them in the competition since March 1985. After five consecutive home wins against Elche in LaLiga between 1975 and 1984, Espanyol have won just one of their subsequent five league matches against them at home, failing to win any of the last three.

programme.title: EN PL GOATS 2025/2026 | E1
EN PL GOATS 2025/2026 | E1
Arsenal vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

programme.title: Southampton vs Millwall - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
programme.desc: Southampton’s Adam Armstrong has scored or assisted in each of his three Championship appearances on New Year’s Day, most recently netting in a 1-1 draw with Norwich City in 2024. Millwall have won four of their last five league games on New Year’s Day but were beaten 1-0 by Oxford United last year – the Lions have never started back-to-back calendar years with defeat on January 1st in the Football League.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19

programme.title: Arsenal vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Matc
programme.desc: Man Utd have won eight of their last 11 Premier League matches against Wolves, beating them 4-1 earlier this month at Molineux. Wolves won this exact fixture 1-0 last season, last winning consecutive away league games against Man Utd between March 1960 and September 1961.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Sevilla - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 17 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Espanyol have only won one of their last six LaLiga games against Elche, the last of which was a 1-0 win in February 2023, and have not won two consecutive games against them in the competition since March 1985. They have not won two consecutive away LaLiga matches against Real Sociedad since 2011.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

programme.desc: Espanyol have only won one of their last six LaLiga games against Elche, the last of which was a 1-0 win in February 2023, and have not won two consecutive games against them in the competition since March 1985. programme.title: Liverpool vs. Leeds United - English Premier League 2026/2027

programme.title: Arsenal vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Matc
programme.desc: Man Utd have won eight of their last 11 Premier League matches against Wolves, beating them 4-1 earlier this month at Molineux. Wolves won this exact fixture 1-0 last season, last winning consecutive away league games against Man Utd between March 1960 and September 1961.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Sevilla - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 17 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Espanyol have only won one of their last six LaLiga games against Elche, the last of which was a 1-0 win in February 2023, and have not won two consecutive games against them in the competition since March 1985. After five consecutive home wins against Elche in LaLiga between 1975 and 1984, Espanyol have won just one of their subsequent five league matches against them at home, failing to win any of the last three.

programme.title: Villarreal vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 17 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Sociedad have lost two of their last three LaLiga matches against Sevilla, after having not lost any of their previous five against the Sevillians in the competition. Sevilla have lost two of their last three visits to Real Sociedad in LaLiga, although their last away league win against them came in March 2025. They have not won two consecutive away LaLiga matches against Real Sociedad since 2011.

programme.title: Paris FC vs Toulouse - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 16
programme.desc: Paris FC have won three of their six meetings with Toulouse in all competitions in the 21st century ; they had failed to win any of their seven such matches played in the previous century. Toulouse are unbeaten in their last eight Ligue 1 games against newly promoted sides – one of only two sides alongside Paris SG and Paris FC to boast such a record since the start of last season.

programme.title: Olympique Lyonnais vs Le Havre - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 16
programme.desc: Lyon have lost just one of their last 12 home matches against Le Havre in Ligue 1, a 1-0 defeat on 13 December 1997. Only Auxerre and Nantes have picked up fewer points than Olympique Lyonnais in Ligue 1 since the start of October, despite Lyon being joint-top of the table with Paris SG before this spell.

programme.title: Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) - Cincinnati Open 2025 - ATP 1000
programme.desc: World No. 1 Jannik Sinner, holder of four Masters 1000 titles and 20 ATP singles trophies, comes into the Cincinnati final after winning two titles this season, including the Australian Open and Wimbledon. Across the net stands Carlos Alcaraz, with seven Masters crowns, 21 career titles, and five tournament victories already in 2025. Their rivalry remains one of the sport’s most exciting, with Alcaraz leading the head-to-head 8–5.

programme.title: Casper Ruud (NOR) vs Denis Shapovalov (CAN) - Final - ATP 500 Dallas Open 2025
programme.desc: Unseeded Denis Shapovalov faces second seed Casper Ruud. Shapovalov reached the final by defeating top-seeded Taylor Fritz and defending champion Tommy Paul, securing his second and third Top 10 wins of the week. Ruud advanced after a challenging semifinal against Jaume Munar, winning in a third-set tiebreak. This final marks Shapovalov's pursuit of his third ATP title and first above the ATP 250 level, while Ruud aims for his 13th career title.

programme.title: Sebastian BAEZ (ARG) vs Alexandre MULLER (FRA) - Final - ATP 500 - Rio Open presented by Claro - 202
programme.desc: The Rio Open presented by Claro is held on the eight clay courts, including a 6,200-seat Stadium, of the Jockey Club Brasileiro. Rafael Nadal won the inaugural edition in 2014 before David Ferrer triumphed in 2015. Dominic Thiem (2017), Diego Schwartzman (2018) and Cristian Garin (2020) have also triumphed at the ATP 500. In 2022, Carlos Alcaraz was crowned champion and became the youngest ATP 500 champion since the category was created in 2009.

programme.desc: Top seed Alexander Zverev (GER) faces second seed Ben Shelton (USA) in a compelling final at the BMW Open. Zverev, aiming for his 24th career title and third in Munich, leads their head-to-head 1–0, having won their previous encounter on hard court. Shelton, seeking his first ATP 500 title, makes history as the first American man since 2002 to reach a clay-court final at this level.

Day 3 - Qatar Prix de l’Arc de Triomphe 2025
programme.desc: The Qatar Prix de l’Arc de Triomphe 2025 is Europe’s flagship Group 1 flat race, staged at Paris Longchamp over 2,400m (about 1m 4f) for elite three-year-olds and up. Run on turf at the heart of Arc weekend, it’s a pure championship test of pace, position, and stamina, drawing the season’s best middle-distance talent with a total purse around €5 million.

programme.title: Al Shamal vs Al Sadd - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W11
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Montpellier vs Sant - Raphael - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Jordan vs Morocco - Final - Fifa Arab cup 2025
programme.desc: Jordan and Morocco go head-to-head for the right to be crowned FIFA Arab Cup 2025 champions. This is Jordan’s second successive major final after finishing runners up in the AFC Asian Cup Final 2024. FIFA World Cup 2022 semi-finalists, Morocco, will start as favourites. Both nations have qualified for the FIFA World Cup 2026. The match is live from a sold-out Lusail Stadium, Doha, Qatar.

programme.title: Uganda vs Nigeria - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Uganda and Nigeria are meeting for the second time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations, 47 years after their initial encounter. It was in the semi-finals of the 1978 edition – Uganda won 2-1. Uganda are unbeaten in their last three matches against Nigeria, winning two and drawing one. Nigeria’s last victory came in a March 2007 AFCON qualifier, thanks to a Nwankwo Kanu goal.

programme.title: Equatorial Guinea vs Algeria - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Equatorial Guinea and Algeria are meeting for the second time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Their previous encounter came in the group stages in January 2022 – Equatorial Guinea won 1-0. Equatorial Guinea and Algeria were in the same qualifying group for the 2025 CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Algeria won 2-0 at home before a goalless draw in Equatorial Guinea.

programme.title: Gabon vs Cote d'Ivoire - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Gabon and Côte d'Ivoire in the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. programme.title: Tanzania vs Tunisia - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Tanzania and Tunisia in the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Tunisia are unbeaten in their two previous encounters with Tanzania, both in November 2020 during CAF Africa Cup of Nations qualifying – winning 1-0 at home before drawing 1-1 away.

programme.title: Benin vs Senegal - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Benin and Senegal are meeting for the second time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Their previous encounter came in the quarter-finals of the 2019 edition – Senegal won 1-0. Benin have lost six of their last seven matches against Senegal in all competitions, losing 1-0 most recently in a friendly in March 2024 via a Sadio Mané penalty.

programme.title: Sudan vs Brukina faso - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Sudan and Burkina Faso are meeting for the second time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Their previous encounter came in the group stages of the 2012 edition – Sudan won 2-1. Sudan have won their final group stage match in one of their previous five CAF Africa Cup of Nations tournaments, though that win came against Burkina Faso in 2012.

programme.title: Sudan vs Brukina faso - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025

programme.title: Mozambique Vs Cameroon - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Mozambique and Cameroon in the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Cameroon have won their last seven matches against Mozambique, scoring 21 goals and conceding only three. Mozambique’s last victory against the Indomitable Lions was 42 years ago, in an April 1983 AFCON qualifier.

programme.title: Equatorial Guinea vs Algeria - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Equatorial Guinea and Algeria are meeting for the second time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Their previous encounter came in the group stages in January 2022 – Equatorial Guinea won 1-0. Equatorial Guinea and Algeria were in the same qualifying group for the 2025 CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Algeria won 2-0 at home before a goalless draw in Equatorial Guinea.

programme.desc: Equatorial Guinea and Algeria are meeting for the second time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. programme.title: Cote d'Ivoire vs Cameroon - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Côte d'Ivoire and Cameroon are facing each other for the ninth time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Including this meeting, only three other fixtures have been played more often in the history of the tournament: Cameroon-Egypt, Côte d'Ivoire-Egypt and Côte d'Ivoire-Ghana. Cameroon hold the upper hand with five wins to one for Côte d'Ivoire in the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Côte d’Ivoire’s sole victory in their eight previous encounters with Cameroon came in their last meeting – a 1-0 win in the group stages of the 2015 edition.

AFCON Morocco 2025 Show
programme.desc: The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations, commonly known as AFCON 2025, marks the 35th edition of this prestigious biennial tournament organized by the Confederation of African Football (CAF). This edition will be hosted by Morocco for the second time, following its previous hosting in 1988. Stay updated with comprehensive coverage of the AFCON Morcco 2025 on beIN Sports News.

programme.title: Ivan Campo
programme.desc: TALKING FOOTBALL is an exclusive unique window into Spanish football and the people that have made it what it is. We talk to LALIGA legends in their environment about deep issues, their successes but also their weaknesses.LaLiga Talking Football is an exclusive unique window into Spanish football and the people that have made it what it is. We talk to LaLiga legends in their environment about deep issues, their successes but also their weaknesses.

programme.desc: An exclusive view into Spanish football, as we talk to LaLiga Legends about their successes and weaknesses.An exclusive view into Spanish football, as we talk to LaLiga Legends about their successes and weaknesses.

programme.title: Luis Garcia
programme.desc: A 26-minute programme in which nine LALIGA legends are invited to choose their ideal eleven. Each episode features a different legend, who is invited to design a line-up following different indications; the best opponents they faced, the best players from LALIGA EA SPORTS 23/24 and the best teammates they played with.Nine LaLiga legends are invited to choose their ideal eleven. Each episode features a different legend selecting from the best opponents they faced, their favourite teammates they played with and the cream of current LaLiga talent.
